item.title: Git Reference
item.description: User-friendly name that points to: a commit SHA-1 hash another reference known as a symbolic reference Using references with Git commands Use reference instead of SHA-1 hashes Master Master is the default name of the main branch in the repository Branch label Points to the most recent commit in the branch The “tip of the branch” Implemented as a reference View local branch references in .
